name: Joystick
goal: Create a joystick visualization that clearly and with no delay moves the joystick in up, down, right, left directions by listening for w,s,a and d keypresses. Use key down and up event. Also show a pad that indicates if spacebar is pressed.

text.PRESET_HINT: This preset includes an embedded sample asset for Joystick. Replace it with your own file if needed.
